content: I'm seeing RA give an "unresolved module" error on something like #[cfg_attr(windows, path = "win32.rs")] mod platform;. Is that something I could make work with the right configuration, or an unimplemented feature? It does seem like RA does know about cfg(windows) in general from invoking rustc --print cfg.
cfg_attr is mostly (entirely?) unimplemented at the moment
Thanks- do you know of a tracking issue for cfg_attr? I couldn't find one
I don't think there is one, but there's lots of FIXMEs in the code
